data.text:
@LemckeLukas @ReicherStephen 15! That's a massive sample size!!
Simply no evidence of longterm effects of covid on vaccinated health individuals.

@bazzat0 @ReicherStephen Older yes, but not more severe. The abstract says that the "effects were still seen after excluding the 15 cases who had been hispitalized". Vaccines: not sure...in the UK, some may already have had a jab Of AZ at that point.
@ReicherStephen @Jojo848329021 Et moi qui attribuais le rétrécissement de mon cerveau à la vie de famille. Je leur dois des excuses.

@ReicherStephen @Harvard2H But the vaccine produces all these effects too. If you vaccinated more it increases the risks each time you have it and you can still get Omicron. Shane Warne: he was double vaxxed, got Omicron and has died at 52 of a heart attack…
@Shahin20634947 @aron_ovsky @ReicherStephen @Kit_Yates_Maths @wbgrant2 Not sure how this follows logically, but most people in U.K. esp if dark skinned in winter wd benefit from vit D supplements
@ReicherStephen Only China and North Korea are safe in the world
@ReicherStephen @birdyavgeekgirl It never was.  Its a bio-weapon
@RodneyCorbine @roto_rua @ReicherStephen Oh yes the IPAK that thinks vaccines cause autism and wrote that article on spontaneous abortion after vaccination. Yeah they're full of shit.
